00016 void imu_feed_gyro_accel(void) {
00017   ADS8344_values[IMU_GYRO_P_CHAN]  = sensors.gyro.value.x;
00018   ADS8344_values[IMU_GYRO_Q_CHAN]  = sensors.gyro.value.y;
00019   ADS8344_values[IMU_GYRO_R_CHAN]  = sensors.gyro.value.z;
00020   ADS8344_values[IMU_ACCEL_X_CHAN] = sensors.accel.value.x;
00021   ADS8344_values[IMU_ACCEL_Y_CHAN] = sensors.accel.value.y;
00022   ADS8344_values[IMU_ACCEL_Z_CHAN] = sensors.accel.value.z;
00023   ADS8344_available = TRUE;
00024 }
00025 
00026 void imu_feed_mag(void) {
00027   ami601_values[IMU_MAG_X_CHAN] = sensors.mag.value.x;
00028   ami601_values[IMU_MAG_Y_CHAN] = sensors.mag.value.y;
00029   ami601_values[IMU_MAG_Z_CHAN] = sensors.mag.value.z;
00030   ami601_status = AMI601_DATA_AVAILABLE;
00031 }
